import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import './contact.css'; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_lrkdihg', 'template_pc1yc4m', form.current, 'QVArMZv5XVK9Zgbli') .then((result) => { alert("Email is Successfully Sent"); }, (error) => { alert("Email is not Sent"); }); }; return(
